title: Complete Brand New House with Factory for Sale in Hanwella.
details: Solidly built Brand New House on a 180 Perches well maintained Land at Samanabadda, Hanwella is available for sale. This fully tiled house approx. 2,400 Sq.Ft, consist of 2 spacious Bedrooms, Master Bedroom A/C, Attached 2 spacious Bathroom, Spacious dinning area, Common Verandah, Pantry, Kitchen, Garage and Parapet Wall, CCTV Camera.
